bill.summary:
Adoption Opportunities Reauthorization Act of 2019
This bill extends through FY2026 and revises programs that promote and facilitate state adoption services. Such programs include grants and technical assistance that focus on the placement of underserved or overrepresented youth in the child welfare system.
